pullrequest.title: (For later review) Split the implementation of template functions

content.raw:
This might be a merge issue, but I was expecting functions not to be removed if the implementation is being split into another file. It might be the case that this function moved to another location in the class. 

Either way, it makes this PR more difficult to review. Do you think you can clean it up?
content.html:
